@dev Truncates the given exp to a whole number value.
     For example, truncate(Exp{mantissa: 15 * expScale}) = 15

devdoc.author: Compound
devdoc.title: Exponential module for storing fixed-precision decimals

userdoc.notice: Exp is a struct which stores decimals with a fixed precision of 18 decimal places.        Thus, if we wanted to store the 5.1, mantissa would store 5.1e18. That is:        `Exp({mantissa: 5100000000000000000})`.
